member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecordsParameters)
member.exception: Thrown if: - First name or last name is null, empty, whitespace, or has an invalid length (less than 2 or more than 40). - Last name has digits. - Date of birth is outside the range January 1, 1940 - today's date. - Number of children is less than 0 or greater than 5. - Number of children is more than 0 and record's age is less than 16. - Annual income is less than 0 or greater than 200,000. - Gender is not one of the allowed values ('M', 'F', 'N').

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.DefaultValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecordsParameters)
member.exception: Thrown if: - First name or last name is null, empty, whitespace, or has an invalid length (less than 2 or more than 60). - Date of birth is outside the range January 1, 1950 - today's date. - Number of children is less than 0 or greater than 10. - Annual income is less than 0 or greater than 250,000. - Gender is not one of the allowed values ('M', 'F', 'N').
